h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: For this encounter, the pig clearly has the home field advantage, and he'll remind you every step of the way with a wide variety of painful moves that are extremely hard to dodge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
For this encounter, the pig clearly has the home field advantage, and he'll remind you every step of the way with a wide variety of painful moves that are extremely hard to dodge.
